title: Shrek
content: Shrek is a fictional ogre who lives in a swamp. He embarks on adventures and is known for his gruff demeanor but ultimately kind heart.

title: Donkey
content: Donkey is Shrek's talkative and loyal companion. He has a knack for getting into trouble but always stands by his friends.

title: Ogre Culture
content: In the world of Shrek, ogres are misunderstood creatures. They value solitude and privacy and are often judged by others.
